name: BeatData
description:
Collecte power nodes while avoiding data loss as you speed throught the cable conection to deliver your data.

Made for the  GamejamBattle 2019 by:

  • Hugo Stindel
  • Pierre Cudennec
  • Marie-Claude Richer
  • Felix Gagne
  • Neha Patel

Won the "Coup de coeur" prize
